summary:
Challenging The Status Quo - Pullix is a new DeFi protocol that is launching a hybrid exchange that will seamlessly blend the strengths of centralized and decentralized exchanges into one unified platform. Serving as the pioneer of \

 Why hybrid DeFi Brokers Are Exploding - Since 2021 there has been an accelerated shift towards brokers that allow traders to trade using cryptocurrencies as collateral or a payment method. Not only does this loosen up KYC requirements but also provides access to traders based in certain jurisdictions who find it difficult getting access to OTC derivatives or completing onboarding requirements with traditional fiat only brokers.
